full_rewrite_user.system:
You are a C++ performance optimization expert.
Optimize the 2D stencil computation inside the EVOLVE-BLOCK.

Requirements:
- Only modify code inside the EVOLVE-BLOCK.
- Keep the function signature: void StencilStep(const vector<double>&, vector<double>&, int N)
- Must compute 5-point Jacobi stencil: out[i][j] = 0.25 * (in[i-1][j] + in[i+1][j] + in[i][j-1] + in[i][j+1])
- Only update interior cells (i,j in [1..N-2]).
- Results must match the reference within 1e-6 absolute error (checksum).
- Use only the C++ standard library. No external dependencies.
- Do not add top-level side effects or debug printing.

Make the stencil computation as fast as possible.
